I'm using build I200404131323.

In Java perspective, I open a java file which contains some warning. When I put 
my mouse cursor over underlined code of one of this warning, no text hover is 
displayed although it should be.

I've verified that when I put the cursor on quick-fix, then I see correctly the 
text hover of the warning.

Running in debug mode, I've seen that there's an SWTException in the tread
"Text Viewer Hover Presenter" which is caught in run() method by the try {...} 
finally {...}. This thread is instanciated in method computeInformation of 
class org.eclipse.jface.text.TextViewerHoverManager
